updates.text: [NSL]Update: Free bus service between #MarinaBay & #MarinaSouthPier has ceased.
[NSL]Update: Train service between #MarinaBay & #MarinaSouthPier has resumed. Free regular bus service is still available between both stns.
[NSL]Update: Due to a signalling fault, free regular bus service is available between #Marinabay & #MarinaSouthPier.
[NSL]Update: Due to a signalling fault, free regular bus service is still available between #Marinabay & #MarinaSouthPier.
[NSL]: Due to a signalling fault, there is no train service between #Marinabay & #MarinaSouthPier.
